current_text: Comedy troupe - Improv, Sketches, and Live Shows
Comedy troupe bringing improv, sketches, and live shows.
Comedy troupe bringing improv, sketches, and live shows
Our flagship production returns February 14th. Bones will rattle. Laughs will echo. Don't miss the most skeletal comedy event of the year.
Get show announcements, behind-the-scenes content, and exclusive updates delivered straight to your inbox.
Wide portrait of Dad Skeleton performers in a styled group setup
Dad Skeleton is a comedy troupe dedicated to bringing laughter through improv, sketch comedy, and live performances. We blend absurdist humor with sharp wit to create unforgettable shows.
We believe comedy should be bold, inclusive, and boundary-pushing. Our mission is to create a space where audiences can escape the ordinary and experience the unexpected.
Our performers come from diverse backgrounds in theater, comedy, and the arts. Together, we craft shows that are equal parts chaos and brilliance.

Interactive generators to spark creativity for your improv and sketch writing.
Generate random scene elements for improv or sketch writing.
Create absurd character names for your sketches.
Get random improv prompts and suggestions.
Quick-fire word game - say the first thing that comes to mind!
A complete writer's toolkit for brainstorming, structuring, drafting, and formatting your creative work.
Rapid brainstorming with timed sprints. Capture raw ideas before they escape, then curate the best ones.
AI-powered prompt generation. Discover unexpected word combinations to spark new creative directions.
Random Prompts; Rhyme Finder; Context Mode
Map your narrative on an infinite hexagonal canvas. Visualize story beats and their connections.
Hex Canvas; Beat Types; Cloud Sync
Minimalist, distraction-free drafting. Zen mode hides the UI while you write, keeping focus on the words.
Professional screenplay formatting. Industry-standard elements with automatic styling and FDX export.
FDX Export; Auto Format; Title Pages
Gamified writing sessions with flow mechanics. Build combos, earn sparks, and maintain your writing momentum.
A gamified writing garden where your words bloom into a living ecosystem. Keep writing or watch your garden freeze.
Frost System; Zone Progression; Ambient Audio
